client.name: FeatureClient
client.description: Azure Feature Exposure Control (AFEC) provides a mechanism for the resource providers to control feature exposure to users. Resource providers typically use this mechanism to provide public/private preview for new features prior to making them generally available. Users need to explicitly register for AFEC features to get access to such functionality.

credential.description: Credential needed for the client to connect to Azure.

subscription_id.description: The ID of the target subscription.

list_operations.doc:

:rtype: ~azure.mgmt.resource.features.v2015_12_01.models.OperationListResult
:raises: ~azure.core.exceptions.HttpResponseError
"""
